docs.lead_paragraph: Childless New York couples, made desperate by the current shortage of healthy white infants, are turning to the legal but often expensive field of private adoption.

headline.main: Adoption Costs Soar as Births Decline; Private Adoption Costs Soar as Unwanted Pregnancies Diminish

docs.snippet: Childless New York couples, made desperate by the current shortage of healthy white infants, are turning to the legal but often expensive field of private adoption.

docs.lead_paragraph: Childless New York couples, made desperate by the current shortage of healthy white infants, are turning to the legal but often expensive field of private adoption.

headline.main: Adoption Costs Soar as Births Decline; Private Adoption Costs Soar as Unwanted Pregnancies Diminish

docs.abstract: Shortage of babies in US, and therefore high cost of nonagency adoption, is attributed to modern contraceptive devices, liberalized abortion laws and lessening of stigma once attached to motherhood
docs.snippet: Childless New York couples, made desperate by the current shortage of healthy white infants, are turning to the legal but often expensive field of private adoption.
